title: Apple AirTags fall to new all-time low in today’s best deals, plus Belkin MagSafe Charger and more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by a new all-time low on Apple’s AirTags 4-pack for $84. That’s alongside the first discount on Belkin’s new Pro 3-in-1 MagSafe Charger and a new low on Logitech Crayon for iPad. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Apple AirTags fall to new all-time low in today’s best deals, plus Belkin MagSafe Charger and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: AirTags 4-pack have fallen to a new all-time low at $85, making now the best chance yet to dive into Apple's U1-enabled item finders.
